title: About me
content:
I am Peter van Bohemen, a passionate photographer from Germany. With over 15 years of experience in wedding, family and event photography, I capture the most beautiful moments of your life.

My specialties include:
• Wedding photography - I accompany you on your special day
• Family portraits - Authentic moments full of love and connection
• Event photography - Professional documentation of your events
• Nature photography - The beauty of our environment captured

For my clients, I provide password-protected galleries where you can view and download your photos in full quality.
